headline: The Trade Desk to Launch Deal Desk – A Revolutionary Approach to Understanding and Managing Digital Advertising Deal Performance
summary: VENTURA, Calif., June 09, 2025--Global advertising technology leader The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) today announced Deal Desk, a transformational new pillar of its Kokai platform that enables advertisers to manage their strategic one-to-one deals and upfront commitments with publishers. Deal Desk gives both advertisers and publishers unprecedented transparency and insight into the performance, quality, and pacing of their deals, and showcases premium internet alternatives when deals underperform.

headline: 2 AI Stocks Down 49% and 86% to Buy Before They Soar, According to Certain Wall Street Analysts
summary: The Trade Desk is an ad tech company that uses artificial intelligence to optimize the digital media buying process.  Upstart is a software company that uses artificial intelligence to help banks and other lenders quantify credit risk.

headline: Advertising Software Stocks Q1 Results: Benchmarking Integral Ad Science (NASDAQ:IAS)
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Integral Ad Science (NASDAQ:IAS) and the rest of the advertising software stocks fared in Q1.
